name: When dedication complete; effect of dedication
text: §441-6  When dedication complete; effect of dedication.  Upon the recordation or filing of a map or plat and certificate of dedication pursuant to sections 441-2 and 441-3, the dedication is complete with respect to all property or parts thereof which are described or depicted in or on both the certificate of dedication and map or plat for all purposes and thereafter the property shall be occupied and used exclusively for cemetery purposes. [L 1967, c 199, pt of §1; HRS §441-6]
